sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="workoutForm" (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()">
  <input formControlName="exercise" placeholder="Exercise">
  <input formControlName="sets" placeholder="Sets" type="number">
  <input formControlName="reps" placeholder="Reps" type="number">
  <input formControlName="duration" placeholder="Duration (minutes)" type="number">
  <button type="submit" [disabled]="!workoutForm.valid">Add Workout</button>
</form>
